show.title: Sai Charithiram
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/Cy4seh
show.description: Theeradha Noigalil irundhu viduthalai vazhanguthal, Bakthargalukku Vendum varangalai aruluthal ena Shirdi Sai Baba avargalin magimaigal indralavum nigazhndhu kondu thaan irukkindrana. Kadavulin avatharam aga nammidaiye nam india dhesathil Vazhntha oru mahan ! Ivar nigalthiya arputhangal eralam, Ivarathu arivuraigal lai kadaipidithu vazhnthal thunbamila inba peru vazhvu nichayam amaiyum. Karunai kadalaam Shirdi Sai Baba avargalin Charithirathai kettu avarin arulai peruvom.
show.description_secondary: Theeradha Noigalil irundhu viduthalai vazhanguthal, Bakthargalukku Vendum varangalai aruluthal ena Shirdi Sai Baba avargalin magimaigal indralavum nigazhndhu kondu thaan irukkindrana. Kadavulin avatharam aga nammidaiye nam india dhesathil Vazhntha oru mahan ! Ivar nigalthiya arputhangal eralam, Ivarathu arivuraigal lai kadaipidithu vazhnthal thunbamila inba peru vazhvu nichayam amaiyum. Karunai kadalaam Shirdi Sai Baba avargalin Charithirathai kettu avarin arulai peruvom.

episodes.title: 45. Kaka Saheb Aiyamum Anandrao Kanda Katchiyum
50.Kakasaheb Dixit - Sri Tembe Swamy - Balaram Dhurandhar
